highlights: Serve as sole analytics partner for Risk Products and own data/dashboards related to 4 risk-related seller-facing products
Design/monitor product KPIs and break down trends with readily-available drivers in bi-weekly company-wide email
Design/implement A/B tests for feature updates/releases and communicate findings/recommendations in written reports
Create logging specifications during product planning stage and use real-time event testing to validate implementation

Developed and implemented a solution to address sticking points in sales-account onboarding flow that increased close rate by 20% and reduced sales cycle and time-to-completion by 10% and 90%, respectively

Led development of an e-commerce risk management strategy using payments/partnership data, and in collaboration with Product/Data Science, which reduced manual caseload and unnecessary account interruptions by 12% and 8%, respectively
Developed metrics to characterize credit risk loss and communicated trends/learnings to leadership and stakeholders
Structured and underwrote credit capital for working capital management, growth acquisitions, and restructures
Monitored performance and repayment strength of portfolio of 38 companies with $50 mm-$4 bn in revenue
Produced detailed financial analysis, extensive modeling, and in-depth industry research for each client quarterly
Graduated from a 6-month credit training program with an emphasis on cash flow analysis, financial modeling, and loan structuring.

volunteer.summary: Terps for Change is an immersive community service-learning program where students partner with local service non-profits to build relationships, directly support organization's long-term strategic mission, and develop an intimate understanding of social issues.
